lead_paragraph: With her son's name Arlen written on her foot, Dana Vollmer dove into Rio De Janeiro's Olympic Aquatics Stadium pool on Sunday and less than a minute later she became the second American woman to win an Olympic swimming medal after having a baby.

headline.print_headline: Swimming: Vollmer Brings Home More Medals for Arlen
headline.main: Swimming: Vollmer Brings Home More Medals for Arlen

snippet: With her son's name Arlen written on her foot, Dana Vollmer dove into Rio De Janeiro's Olympic Aquatics Stadium pool on Sunday and less than a minute later she became the second American woman to win an Olympic swimming medal after having a baby....
